sub0: Map Module is the heart of the whole game. This is the place where you make the most important decisions. The most important places of Map Module are: map, buildings panel and resources panel. To learn how to use them, visit one of the links below.
sub1: When you want to leave the Map Module, you need to use one of buttons in bottom-right corner. If you'd like to move to another game module (Exchange or Tutorial), click "Main Menu" button. If you'd like to finish game permanently, click "End game" button.
